name: tablist2

scripts.start: parcel watch src/newtab.html src/options.html --dist-dir dist_dev && cp src/manifest.json dist_dev/manifest.json
scripts.build: parcel build --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --no-scope-hoist src/newtab.html src/options.html  --dist-dir dist && cp src/manifest.json dist/manifest.json && mkdir -p dist/assets/icons/ && cp src/assets/icons/* dist/assets/icons/

author: Arthur Gerkis
description: Tab management extension that replaces the new tab page with a list of all open tabs and groups.
